ncdump
  • Reference
  • News

Activate variable

Stolen from tidygraph, we need this

activate(.data, what)

# S3 method for NetCDF
activate(.data, what)

nctive(x)

# S3 method for NetCDF
print(x)

Arguments

.data

NetCDF object
what

name of a variable

Value

NetCDF object

Details

activate puts the named variable first nctive gets and sets the active variable

Examples

example(NetCDF)
#> Warning: no help found for ‘NetCDF’
activate(rnc, "palette")
#> [1] "Variable: palette"
#> [1] "(chlor_a)"
#> [1] "Dimension:"
#>            name length unlimited
#> 1           lat   2160     FALSE
#> 2           lon   4320     FALSE
#> 3           rgb      3     FALSE
#> 4 eightbitcolor    256     FALSE
f <- "/rdsi/PRIVATE/raad/data/eclipse.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/OI-daily-v2/NetCDF/2017/AVHRR/avhrr-only-v2.20170502_preliminary.nc"
x <- NetCDF(f)
nctive(x)
#> [1] "sst"
x <- activate(x, "sst")
